chapter.title: Working with Process Activities
chapter.para: The Process Activities view shows the process activities for a selected process (process unit). The overview table in the Process Activities view includes all activities for the process(es) selected in the Processes view. process activities process
The following actions are supported in the Process Activities view:

sect1.title: Listing Process Activities
sect1.para: If you have previously selected at least one process in the Processes view (see ), you can display an overview of the existing process activities in the Process Activities view.
The overview table displays the following information for each process by default:

listitem.para: The automatically generated unique identifier of the process activity (sequential number).
The user-defined name of the process to which the process activity is attached.
The process sequence of the process to which the process activity is attached.
The handler to which the process is assigned.
The unique identifier of a job associated with the process (or process activity).
Status of the process activity (for example, STARTED or FINISHED).
Selection criterion for the jobs to be processed.

sect1.title: Displaying Process Activities Details
sect1.para: You can display the details for a specific process in the details pane as follows: The details pane contains the same scope of information as the overview table.
Click an entry in the overview table to display detailed information in the details pane.

sect1.title: Filtering Process Activities
sect1.para: Use this action to filter the overview of available process activities based on the available columns.
Proceed as follows to filter the existing process activities and thus reduce the number of displayed process activities.

step.para: Switch to the Process Activities view.
In the navigation bar of the view, click Filter.
You can filter the existing process activities by ID (simple filter) or by other parameters (for more information about filter criteria, see ).
